title: Texas Monthly extreme slab serif headline face
content:
Can anyone help me identify this font?  
Thanks in advance!  
topher

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080327211534im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Mysteryfont_4918.jpg)

 [‹ (x) Dyson Bauhaus-like logo sans - custom designed {Andrew J. Sipe}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080327211534/http:/typophile.com/node/43554 "Go to previous forum topic") ["portfolio-cph" superellipse futuristic sans ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080327211534/http:/typophile.com/node/43483 "Go to next forum topic")
author: topherjgarcia

comments.content: While it is not an exact match, it reminded me of the excellent [Black Slabbath](http://web.archive.org/web/20080327211534/http:/www.youworkforthem.com/product.php?sku=T0133).
That is gorgeous. I hope we get an ID.

Quincunx did a great close match with Black Slabbath (coolest name ever) but I’m still looking for the true font... as well as waiting on a call back from Texas Monthly Magazine!  
topher
